refunds.deescalationTitle: Have you tried contacting the coach?
refunds.deescalationBody: Often, a quick message can resolve issues directly without opening a formal dispute. This is usually the fastest way to a solution.

betterDealApplied: You're already getting a better deal with the '{{dealName}}' promotion!
pricingHierarchyInfo: If a session qualifies for multiple automatic discounts (e.g., special period & time-based rate), the system will automatically apply the one most beneficial to the client. Discount codes are checked separately.
errorOverlappingPeriod: This period overlaps with an existing one for the same session type.
betterDealKept: You already have a better deal! The '{{dealName}}' promotion has been kept.
bestPriceInfo: Promotions and discount codes cannot be combined.
cancellationPastRefundWindowInfo: You are outside the refund window, but you can still cancel the booking. No refund will be issued.
cancellationReason.eligible: Your cancellation request is within the {{hours}} hour notice period before the session.
cancellationReason.minimumNoticeViolated: Your cancellation request is outside the {{hours}} hour notice period before the session.
